LAXC_CRW_Coreto |guid = d4385da1-0d2e-451c-a0be-59e6436f3ad9 }} '''Coreto''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}, included as part of the [Scalawags Pack](/scalawagsPack/). ## Background A master navigator from [The Vailian Republics](/theVailianRepublics/). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |none = |other = |crew = {{crewrank|4|navigator}}
Personality: Professional
{{cp2|1000}} to hire }} ## Trivia * Coreto is the only Master-skilled crew member in the game (at least of those that are recruitable, not counting the crew from the "Legendary Crew" [Berath's Blessing](/berathsBlessing/)). [Category:Crookspur crew recruits](/categoryCrookspurCrewRecruits/) [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
